title: Hotkey ability upgrade fail
body: I can use my ability hotkeys, by i cant upgrade abilities with hotkeys with cntrl or shift. Suggestions?

replies.body: If you're still experiencing this issue then your keys for learning abilities may be unbound.  While in-game, go over to your keybindings to make sure you have it set to your preference.  Let me know if you are still having issues and we can dig deeper.
